name: Odin, the Ruling God
text:
Activate. Remove a resonator in your field: If it is a light attribute, this card gains Target Attack until end of turn. If it is a dark attribute, this card gains Pierce until end of turn.
Activate. Discard all cards in your hand: Recover this card. This ability can be used only once per turn.
Continuous: When this card is put into your field, if it has done judgment other than playing J-Activate ability, this card gains Pierce and Target Attack until end of turn and can attack this turn.
set: The Shaft of Light of Valhalla
